events.name: Vocaloop vocaloid looper demo and workshop
events.description:
Music and Technology: VOCALOOP
Sat 11 Mar | 10.30am to 12.30pm | Activity Room, Basement 1, Runme Shaw CFA Studios
http://bit.ly/vlpmusic
This Saturday, the team from Japan that invented the revolutionary VOCALOOP vocal looper will be explaining how it works and demonstrating it at NUS Centre for the Arts Studios. 
Workshop admission is free but registration required. Please share with friends who might be interested in #vocaloid #looper #electronicmusic #maker #hacker #musictechnology 
Find out more about VOCALOOP at the website http://vocaloop.jp/
and watch the video at https://youtu.be/sIuN6aF26oA
events.location: NUS CFA Studios, 10 Kent Ridge Crescent, Singapore 119279 119277

events.name: Web Development with Express
events.description:
Venue: NUS School of Computing COM1 02-04 (Seminar Room 2) (CONFIRMED)

Express is a small but powerful micro-framework for creating web applications in Node.js. In this workshop we'll take a whirlwind tour of Express and, in the process, learn about the common MVC web application pattern. We'll also cover the basic ideas necessary for building web applications (whether in Express or otherwise).

Familiarity with the basics of HTML, CSS and programming in general is expected. Knowledge of JavaScript is a plus.

Note: Bring your own laptop. Please charge fully before coming as power points are limited.
events.location: NUS School of Computing, 13 Computing Drive, Singapore 117417

events.name: First-ever in-mall drone stunt at White Sands Shopping Centre
events.description:
What lets you experience flying without having to go through cadet school? Drones! If you thought that Drones are only used to deliver goods and film aerial shots, think again – did you know that Drones are also built for flying competitions?
 
On March 11 and 12 (Saturday and Sunday), you’ll be one of the first to witness the first-ever in-mall Drone stunt show at White Sands Shopping Centre. The upper floors of the Mall will be decked up to display the flying prowess of the many Drones piloted by members from Performance Rotors.
 
As a strong supporter of the community and its neighbours, White Sands, in partnership with Performance Rotors, will also be hosting a series of workshops on March 11, Saturday at the Pasir Ris Public Library on Level 4 to allow families to learn and experience the joys of building their own Drone and piloting it as well! Slots are limited, and sign-ups can be done through Level 2 Customer Service counter.
 
If your interest is piqued after the workshop and stunts, come down on June 24, Saturday and catch the professionals in action as the Mall hosts the first ever in-mall Drone flying competition!
 
Take a sneak peek of what to expect with this video here: https://www.facebook.com/WhiteSandsSG/videos/10155020100936530/
 
Event Information

First ever in-mall Drone stunt show – March 11 and 12, Saturday and Sunday, at 1 to 2pm, 6 to 7pm (along the vertical void above the mall’s main atrium)

 

Drones workshop with Performance Rotors – March 11,Saturday at 10am /11.30am /3.15pm /4.45pm (Pasir Ris Public Library, Level 4)

 

First ever in-mall Drone competition – June 24, Saturday at mall’s main atrium.

 
For more information on the drone stunt event and workshops at White Sands Shopping Centre, do reach out to us at AsiaMallsSG@hoffman.com.
events.location: White Sands, 1 Pasir Ris Central Street 3, Singapore 518457, Singapore 518457

events.name: HackerspaceSG Awesome Talks: Music Edition
events.description:
HackerspaceSG Awesome Talks (HAT) took a hiatus and we are back! This time we are starting off with 2 sets of speakers who are in town from Japan!

=============================================
Talk 1: Make your own synth! - littleBits Synth Kit (18min)
Presenterr: Tadahiko Sakamaki, Product Planner / Product Designer / DJ.

The littleBits Synth Kit, which I proposed the idea to littleBits and developed together, allows anyone to create synthesizer. I will show you how to make a synthesizer using the littleBits Synth Kit, and I will perform at the end.



=============================================
Talk 2: VOCAL LOOP SEQUENCER - VOCALOOP (18 min)
Presenter: Team members of VOCALOOP http://vocaloop.jp/

VOCALOOP is the hardware musical instrument designed and produced by Anizon. It sings in Japanese by the LSI sound generator with VOCALOID Engine.

PS. If you are interested in doing a lightning talk( < 5min), we are happy to accomodate if there is sufficient time
events.location: HackerspaceSG, 344B King George's Avenue, King George's Building, Singapore 208576
